segments.advisor_message: So, let's start with some basics! What's your first name and last name?
segments.client_message: Uh, yeah, my first name's Jordan and last name's Smith, but I’m known as Jody, actually!

segments.advisor_message: Great, Jody! Do you also have any middle names or we just keep it simple?
segments.client_message: Naw, no middle names here, just Jody Smith.

segments.advisor_message: Alright, cool! And what's your date of birth, if you don’t mind sharing? Just making sure I get everything right.
segments.client_message: Sure, it’s 15-08-1990. I was born in New York too, just so ya know.
